entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
